articles.title: Breath of the Wild with 30 mods is pure chaos - Polygon
articles.description: A Twitch streamer recently played an extremely modded version of The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, featuring appearances from Untitled Goose Game, Sans from Undertale, Charizard, flying Goombas, and more.
